description:
Inputs for the Llama4 bundle.
This class extends LLMBundleInputs to include specific fields for Llama4.

hf_token.x-description: Provide a Hugging Face API token linked to an account with access to the model specified above. This token will be used to download model files from the Hugging Face Hub, including gated or private repositories where applicable.

autoscaling_enabled.title: Autoscaling Enabled
autoscaling_enabled.x-description: Enable or disable autoscaling for the LLM.

title: LLama4Inputs
